GSD.description:
drm/gem: Fix GEM handle release errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 67bf86ff81fe6e222e4f434251de4b45239444b4. For more details please see the references link.
